subtitle.html: We fabricate, deliver and assemble - service from the beginning to the final execution.

code.html:

content.html: Our activities include project/machine designs, technological and technical solutions, CAD construction, preparation of project documentation and assembly of machines and devices.
content.markdown: Our activities include project/machine designs, technological and technical solutions, CAD construction, preparation of project documentation and assembly of machines and devices.

content.html: We weld steel, stainless steel, and aluminum products with MAG / MIG and TIG technologies.
content.markdown: We weld steel, stainless steel, and aluminum products with MAG / MIG and TIG technologies.

content.html: As part of our comprehensive project implementation service, we also provide assembly of individual manufactured elements into semi-finished and final products according to your order. At the same time, we also provide the appropriate packaging and transport-safe packing.
content.markdown: As part of our comprehensive project implementation service, we also provide assembly of individual manufactured elements into semi-finished and final products according to your order.  At the same time, we also provide the appropriate packaging and transport-safe packing.

content.html: Our activities include project/machine designs, technological and technical solutions, CAD construction, preparation of project documentation and assembly of machines and devices.
content.markdown: Our activities include project/machine designs, technological and technical solutions, CAD construction, preparation of project documentation and assembly of machines and devices.

content.html: We weld steel, stainless steel, and aluminum products with MAG / MIG and TIG technologies.
content.markdown: We weld steel, stainless steel, and aluminum products with MAG / MIG and TIG technologies.

content.html: As part of our comprehensive project implementation service, we also provide assembly of individual manufactured elements into semi-finished and final products according to your order. At the same time, we also provide the appropriate packaging and transport-safe packing.
content.markdown: As part of our comprehensive project implementation service, we also provide assembly of individual manufactured elements into semi-finished and final products according to your order.  At the same time, we also provide the appropriate packaging and transport-safe packing.

content.html: Naše dejavnosti vključujejo oblikovanje projektov/strojev, tehnološke in tehnične rešitve, 3D konstruiranje, pripravo projektne dokumentacije ter montažo strojev in naprav.
content.markdown: Naše dejavnosti vključujejo oblikovanje projektov/strojev, tehnološke in tehnične rešitve, 3D konstruiranje, pripravo projektne dokumentacije ter montažo strojev in naprav.

content.html: Varimo izdelke iz jekla, nerjavečega jekla in aluminija s tehnologijami MAG/MIG in TIG.
content.markdown: Varimo izdelke iz jekla, nerjavečega jekla in aluminija s tehnologijami MAG/MIG in TIG.

content.html: Kot del naše celovite storitve izvajanja projektov nudimo tudi montažo posameznih izdelanih elementov v polizdelke in končne izdelke v skladu z vašim naročilom. Hkrati zagotavljamo ustrezno pakiranje in varno embalažo za prevoz.
content.markdown: Kot del naše celovite storitve izvajanja projektov nudimo tudi montažo posameznih izdelanih elementov v polizdelke in končne izdelke v skladu z vašim naročilom. Hkrati zagotavljamo ustrezno pakiranje in varno embalažo za prevoz.

fields.label: Subheading
fields.value: Whether you have questions or feedback, we're always ready to hear from you. Please send us an email or contact us on social media, and we'll do our best to respond within 24-48 hours.

en.heading: Contact Us
en.subheading: Whether you have questions or feedback, we're always ready to hear from you. Please send us an email or contact us on social media, and we'll do our best to respond within 24-48 hours.

sl.heading: Kontaktirajte nas
sl.subheading: Ne glede na to, ali imate vprašanja ali povratne informacije, smo vedno pripravljeni prisluhniti. Prosimo, pošljite nam e-pošto ali nas kontaktirajte prek družbenih omrežij, in trudili se bomo odgovoriti v roku 24-48 ur.
